dynamic-element.dynamic-content: What if there were a hybrid job that pushed you to learn cutting-edge technologies, gave you opportunities to provide innovative solutions to clients like Cisco, Sesame Street, AutoZone, and Volkswagen, pushed you to fix the most complex technical problems, and equipped you to train the growing population of Liferay users? Well, enter stage left a new position we just opened. Our new Consultant position is a cross between consulting, technical support, and training. We're looking for people who love open source, enjoy wearing multiple hats, and want to grow with a company that's bursting at the seams. Apply now and tell us why you'd like to join the Liferay family.
